name: MegaBlock
description:
Welcome to the Mega Block!

ver 6.0.0

Here you can create your own little world and also save it!

The game has a very simple interface.

Control in the game

w, a, s, d - camera control in the editor

a. d, space - player control

right mouse button - object spawn

left mouse button - object deletion

I wish you a pleasant game!
